grain_rate.description: Maximum (nominal) number of grains per second for Flows of this Source - only used if Flow is periodic: numerator/denominator - denominator only required if non-integer rate.  Corresponding Flow grain rate may override if that Flow comprises a subsample of Grains.  This is not intended to be used for a variable grain rate Source - in that case the grain_rate attribute would be omitted.

device_id.description: Globally unique identifier for the Device which initially created the Source

parents.description: Array of UUIDs representing the Source IDs of Grains which came together at the input to this Source (may change over the lifetime of this Source)

clock_name.description: Reference to clock in the originating Node
